title: WAR! WaPo's Taylor Lorenz ATTACKS Libs of TikTok!
description:
It finally happened. They “exposed" @LibsofTikTok. We're returning fire at the Washington Post's resident useless tart responsible, Taylor Lorenz. We also cover the Trump-appointed judge with the courage to end the airline mask mandate. And why is the Easter Bunny protecting Joe Biden from reporters? #WaPo #LibsOfTikTok #TaylorLorenz
